info.title: Honcho API
info.summary: An API for adding personalization to AI Apps
info.description:
This API is used to store data and get insights about users for AI
    applications

license.name: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0

post.description: Get All Users for an App

put.description: Update a User's name and/or metadata

get.description: Get a User or create a new one by the input name

post.description: Get All Sessions for a User
Create a Session for a User

put.description: Update the metadata of a Session

delete.description: Delete a session by marking it as inactive

get.description: Get a specific session for a user by ID

post.description: Stream Results from the Dialectic API

get.description: Clone a session for a user, optionally will deep clone metamessages as well

post.description: Adds a message to a session
Get all messages for a session

put.description: Update the metadata of a Message

post.description: Adds a message to a session
Get all messages for a session

get.description: Get a specific Metamessage by ID

put.description: Update's the metadata of a metamessage

post.description: Paginate through the user metamessages for a user
Get All Collections for a User

put.description: Update a Collection's name or metadata

delete.description: Delete a Collection and its documents

post.description: Get all of the Documents in a Collection

put.description: Update the content and/or the metadata of a Document
